name: "Fungus Face" McGillicutty
effect: When this ally is destroyed, you may destroy target ability.
Death hasn't robbed the Forsaken of the ability to understand what you say. They're just not likely to listen.

name: Arathyen, the Sun's Shadow
effect: (2), Flip Arathyen → Ready target Ghoul you control.
"I have returned from the dark places where the sun - and the Sunwell - have no authority."

name: Archival Purposes
effect:
Pay (4) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Take this vessel with you as you silence these echoes. A portion of their energies will be archived within the Bronze Dragonflight's depository." - Alurmi

name: Baru Gravehorn
effect:
Protector

When this ally enters play, if there are three or more allies in your graveyard, you may put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play.
"The Earthmother may have forsaken me, but I must be that which I am."

name: Blight Bringers
effect: Up to three target allies have -3 ATK this turn.
"Beware their claws - even the slightest touch can be debilitating!" - Vanira Raventhorne

name: Claemora Amberglare
effect: When this ally enters play, target hero or ally has Assault 2 this turn.
Her looks are all the distraction her allies need to land a killing blow.

name: Dark Transformation
effect:
Unholy Talent

Attach to target Ghoul.

Ongoing: Attached Ghoul has +7 / +7.

When attached Ghoul deals damage to an opposing hero, destroy target opposing ally.

name: Death Coil
effect:
Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally.

Ready a Ghoul you control.
Those who have shunned the Light are welcomed with open arms by the shadows.

name: Death's Duo
effect: Remove two target allies in an opposing graveyard from the game. If you do, put two 3 / 3 Ghoul ally tokens into play.
"This sunken city is rife with corpses longing to serve me." - Deathbringer Kor'ush

name: Deathlord Jones
effect:
When this ally enters play, put a 3 / 3 Unique Ghoul ally token named Brode into play exhausted with "This ally can't ready during its controller's ready step."

Once per turn, on your turn: (3) → This ally deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Ready a Ghoul you control.

name: Drandus the Deathcaller
effect:
Protector

Ghouls you control have Assault 2.
"Obey the word of your master, or I will return you to the grave myself."

name: Emelia Darkhand
effect:
Protector

This ally can't attack unless an opponent controls more allies than you.
"Our troubles lie abroad, where the armies of the Lich King dwell. That is where the true challenge awaits."

name: Entrenched
effect:
If you control an ally: Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Diamant says you are to be trusted. Diamant is patient and wise, so I shall allow you to prove yourself." - Kor the Immovable

name: Escape from Durnholde
effect:
Pay (1) to complete this quest.

Reward: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one on top of your deck and the rest on the bottom.
"We will leave when you are ready." - Thrall

name: Festering Disease
effect:
Attach to target opposing hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put the top card of attached hero's controller's deck into his graveyard. If it's an ally, your hero heals 1 damage from itself.
"Demons can be just as susceptible to disease and decay as we are. Use this to your advantage." - Ian Barus

name: Gravelord Adams
effect:
When you play this ally, you may pay (1) any number of times.

Put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play for each (1) paid this way.
"I will call on the dead, friend and foe alike, to rise up and serve in an army of the damned."

name: Horn of Winter
effect: Heroes and allies you control have Assault 1 this turn.
"The last sound you'll hear before death grips your soul." - Ayaka Winterhoof

name: Karrok Scarrend
effect: "The more, the merrier!" - Scarrend family motto

name: Raise the Dead
effect: Put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play.
"There is such beauty in death." - Ghoulmaster Kalisa

name: Siphon of Undeath
effect: Destroy target ally. If you control a Ghoul, your hero heals 5 damage from itself.
"Death and decay: both are inevitable." - Barathex, Undeath's Hand

name: The Essence of Enmity
effect:
Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"The creatures you seek swarm over the Den of Flame to the northwest and the Stonemaul Ruins to the north." - Brogg

name: The Path to the Dragon Soul
effect:
Pay (1) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
"Distract Mannoroth, and the link between the Dragon Soul and the Well will be broken." - Nozdormu

name: Vuza'jin
effect: (2) → Token allies you control have +1 ATK this turn.
